QuestData.Title: No Man Left Behind
QuestData.Description: I sent recon out over an hour ago and none of them have reported back. And now these damned hounds are pouring out of the chasm.$b$bI don't know what's going on down there, but I'm not going anywhere till I get my men back.$b$bI want you to head in there and find them, $n, preferably while they are still alive.
QuestData.LogDescription: Rescue 5 SI:7 Rangers in Ragefire Chasm.
QuestData.RewardText: That's all that survived?$b$bThe Horde is going to pay for this in blood.
